name: HSP_BFH_ACT_DATA_BDC_ROI
description: Release of Information (ROI) documents created during the billing activity.

columns.name: BFH_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the activity history record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: ACT_BDC_ROI_ID
columns.description: This column stores the Id of the Release of Information (ROI) record that was created by the associated action.
